last_episode_to_air.name: Animals Never Shut Up
last_episode_to_air.overview: This time, it's personal. Family secrets send the trio on dicey expeditions, into the jaws of wolves in the Yukon and the maws of hippos in the Congo.

name: Adventure Beast
overview: A brave zoologist, his spunky niece and anxious assistant explore the world while saving wild beasts in this adult animated educational-comedy series.

episodes.name: Nature Hates Jerks
episodes.overview: In Ethiopia, the wonders — and horrors — of nature come alive. Bradley gets elbow deep into his work while Dietrich monkeys around with Bonnie.

episodes.name: Parenthood Is Perilous
episodes.overview: New life can be brutal in Australia, where BTG chases numbats, sand sharks eat siblings in the womb, and newborn orcas keep mama awake for a month.

episodes.name: When Love Goes Wrong
episodes.overview: All's fair in love — and group mating rituals. Witness the flamboyant flamingo, belly-flopping eagle ray and one seriously awkward field assistant.

episodes.name: Only the Scared Survive
episodes.overview: Fear can be your friend — just ask a spooked pangolin or a panicked Dietrich. Later, BTG reveals the traumatic basis of his worst baboon nightmares.

episodes.name: We Live on a Queer Planet
episodes.overview: Welcome to a hairy new habitat: Hollywood. BTG unleashes black swans in a queer-critter TV segment. But can he flip the script on a killer cassowary?

episodes.name: Trust No One
episodes.overview: Venomous lorises, vicious martens, zoologist influencers — the Himalayas abound with dangers. Still, the goatzilla, aka gnu goat, calls to BTG's team.

episodes.name: Evil Is Natural
episodes.overview: BTG flirts with gory death by waking hibernating bears and swimming with orcas, knowing that many animals kill for fun. Which murdered the intern?

episodes.name: Monsters Are Real
episodes.overview: The gang gets revved for a Louisiana monster jam: Bonnie wants to expose the murder swamp's mysteries, and BTG hunts for aliens, as in alien species.

episodes.name: Live Lazy or Die Trying
episodes.overview: Turn up those beach vibes because survival can depend on smart slothfulness, especially when you're stranded on an island swarming with predators.

episodes.name: Life Is Ugly
episodes.overview: Out to save a desert rain frog, BTG, Bonnie and Dietrich crash-land in Namib Desert, where they must munch on insects and have a blast in a sandstorm.

episodes.name: Feed the Beast
episodes.overview: Taste drives all animals as the team searches for an elusive cheese hermit amid circling lammergeiers, fresh maggots and molecular gastronomy snacks.

episodes.name: Animals Never Shut Up
episodes.overview: This time, it's personal. Family secrets send the trio on dicey expeditions, into the jaws of wolves in the Yukon and the maws of hippos in the Congo.
